## Rust History

- First version came out in 2015
- Updates are labelled "editions"
   - 2015 - first major release (1.0.0)
   - 2018 - new keywords, the edition system (1.31.0)
   - 2021 - extra cargo features (1.56.0)
   - 2024 - more keywords, further unsafe behaviours (1.85.0)
